Class MeteorAnnounceState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.state.CardState
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.state.MeteorAnnounceState
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class MeteorAnnounceState extends CardState
Class representing an Announce State of the MeteorSwarmCard.
